title: Async Task Simulation
description: Simulate concurrent task execution by modeling tasks as functions that return results, then combine them.
instructions: Create functions fetchUserName() and fetchUserAge() that return hardcoded values. Combine them into a formatted string and print the result.

hints.text: Create simple functions that return String and Int
Call both functions and combine their results
Use string templates to format the output

commonMistakes.consequence: This is a preview - keep it simple
commonMistakes.correction: Just demonstrate the concept of combining results from separate functions

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to use actual coroutine APIs
commonMistakes.correction: Simulate the concept with regular functions for now
Follow the exact format: 'User: Alice, Age: 25'
